query: WITH entities AS (SELECT credit_facility_id, created_at, id FROM payments WHERE ((credit_facility_id = $1) AND (COALESCE((created_at, id) < ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PaymentId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN payment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.created_at desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
